action.action-desc: Mr. Teague (for himself and Mrs. Kirkpatrick of Arizona) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veteransâ€™ Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the amount of educational assistance provided to certain veterans for flight training.

section.text: Subsection (e)(1) of section 3032 of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking 60 percent and inserting 75 percent.
